title: Julian of Norwich, ' Revelations of Divine Love': A Critical Edition
abstractText: To produce the authoritative critical edition of Julian of Norwich's 'revelations of Divines Love', which will be published by OUP. By means of full scholarly apparatus of introductory essays and extended commentary, explanatory notes and glossary, to advance the understanding in its context of the earliest clearly attributable work in English by a woman author, and to reappraise its textual evaluation through the mystic's revision of her contemplative interpretation of her original vision.
